short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lonely traveler finds herself in a very uncomfortable situation, when a suspicious-looking stranger starts following her...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Each of us represents the future in different ways. 
Flying on a spaceship to Galaxies and daily adventures in new worlds or war against alien invaders? We can imagine all of these variants, but one thing remains constant. People 
always need energy, especially oil, electricity or new sources that are hidden somewhere outside of our house.

To search for new deposits of energy people are constantly sending fleets of ships, but the 
space is dangerous and it often happens that the expedition can't save its mind in outer space, 
and sometimes ordinary meteor shower can destroy all. 

In our history, you will find
yourself in a similar situation. 
You need to get out of the ring 
meteorites and inform people
about the tragedy that destroyed the expedition.

In this game you can find:
- Nice graphics.
- Addictive gameplay with achievements.
- Space atmosphere.
- Reaction training.

Update v1.9 (27.06.2021)

- Some fixes
